name: Temple Raiders (rellcking26)
description:
Temple Raiders is a 2d platformer where you collect coins and jump on enemies. The game follows an adventurer who goes on an adventure through a cursed desert to claim treasure from an ancient tomb. So far this is my first game and an early build of the game so expect updates. 

There are also secret areas try to find them ;)

Controls

WASD or Arrow keys to move and controller support

Press start on the controller or enter on keyboard to open menu
